General.Name: China Tianrui Group Cement Company Limited
General.Description: China Tianrui Group Cement Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the production, distribution, and sale of clinker, cement, and limestone aggregates in the People's Republic of China. It serves real estate developers, concrete manufacturers, etc. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Ruzhou, the People's Republic of China. China Tianrui Group Cement Company Limited is a subsidiary of Yu Kuo Company Limited.
General.Address: No. 63, Guangcheng East Road, Ruzhou, China, 467500
